page.title: 05BORELAND STOCK, KIRKCOWAN
page.content: Mr Mc Cornick owns Boreland Farm,a{ {mixed farm}with 70 pedigreed Ayrshire{ {dairy cows,}100 Charolais/Galloway cross{bullocks}and 280{black faced {sheep.}He breeds most of his own stock.All year the beef cattle and sheep are outside while the Ayrshires are kept inside expect when they are put outside to allow him to clean the sheds.If it is mild the dairy cattle go outside about mid April.The stock are fed on{silage,hay,straw,ground {barley}and{cake,}all of which except for the cake are produced on the farm.From August until October he{ {sells}stock at Castle Douglas,Newton Stewart and Ayr{markets.}Because of{ {better crop}growing due to more{ {machinery and fertiliser}being used he keeps{more stock.}The absentee, owner of the farm has not made many changes to the buildings.
